originalText.text: I could not recommend Faze 4 Orchestras enough. They performed at my wedding and stole the night. We spent all this money on the venue, food, flowers, the hotel, etc and all I heard about the night of and since then was the band. Not only being talented, Bob and the rest of the crew were incredibly professional, accomodating, and went so far out of their way to make our night special. We were extremely lucky to have found them and they should be your first stop after getting engaged.

originalText.text:
Faze 4 Orchestras (Metropolis) was fantastic in every way on the lead up to and the day of our wedding in May 2022!

We contracted Metropolis for the 10-piece band and we've received compliments from everyone who attended that they were one of the best bands they've experienced at a wedding.

Bob was always responsive when working to coordinate with us on the details for the day (intro music, special dances, etc.) and was very easy to bounce ideas off of to find the right sound for the day. We left the majority of the music choices up to Bob and the band and we had a packed dance floor for the entire night. Metropolis sounded amazing, knew how to keep the party going and was an absolute hit. They were so great we are trying to come up with excuses to book them for another party.

We would highly recommend Faze 4 Orchestras (especially Metropolis) for your wedding band.

originalText.text:
Booking Faze4, Alex Gold Band, was the best decision we made for our wedding!!! Our biggest wish for our wedding was for our guests to have fun and I can confidently say this wish was granted thanks to Faze 4, Alex Gold band! They were absolutely INCREDIBLE.  6+ months later our guests are still talking about how amazing they were, and my mom still can’t get over the fact “we had a concert at our wedding.”  Dancing didn’t stop the entire night because Alex Gold Band never allowed for a dull moment, and I still get chills thinking about one of their members singing our wedding song Beyond by Leon Bridges- it was perfect.  I CANNOT RECOMMEND THEM ENOUGH!!  Bob at Faze4 was incredible helping coordinate and book everything.  He was a pleasure to work with.  We booked Alex Gold Band without ever seeing them perform in person due to covid but it was seriously the best decision we made throughout the whole wedding planning process.
-Erin & Nick

originalText.text: We hired Faze 4's Michael Kane Band. They were very easy to work with and were amazing.  Everyone danced the entire evening. They made it so easy to plan the event and guided us through many questions we had in regard to the flow of the evening.  All I can say is that all our guests are still raving about the music!

originalText.text: Bob Foreman and the Original Faze 4 Orchestra will provide you with the best entertainment on earth. From start to finish of my daughter’s wedding Saturday night, the music quality was astounding and the crowd was on their feet. The sound level is perfect and no one complains that the music is too loud and you can actually talk to someone without yelling. A pounding DJ is no substitute. The Faze 4 musicians are so good that you think you are listing to the original recording. Bob is absolutely the best host and the most accommodating band leader I have ever seen. He will deliver everything you ask and more. If you need music, you better get Faze 4!
